title: Bandbox, ca. 1840
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Blue field, printed in pink, green and brown. Framework of white interlaces, enclosing medallions: one, of women watching clowns; one, of a basket of fruit. Lined with newspapers of 1839.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bandbox, ca. 1840.
ca. 1840. Block-printed paper on pasteboard support. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1917-36-8-a,b.
